text_en: Understanding the intricate web of emotions and relationships is a fundamental aspect of human interaction. In a world where connections with others shape our experiences and well-being, delving into the science behind these phenomena can unveil valuable insights. By exploring the realms of neuroscience and psychology, we can gain a deeper understanding of how emotions influence our relationships and, in turn, our lives.
text_zh: 理解情感和人际关系的错综复杂网络是人类互动的基本方面。在一个人与他人的联系塑造我们的经历和幸福感的世界中，深入探索这些现象背后的科学，可以揭示宝贵的见解。通过探索神经学和心理学的领域，我们可以更深入地了解情感如何影响我们的关系，进而影响我们的生活。
